name: Grim Arrow
description:
Grim Arrow

Grim Arrow is a procedurally generated roguelike dungeon crawler. Explore the vast rooms, clearing demons. How long can you survive!

Grim arrow has a classic 4 colour classic stylised look, tight fast paced combat and resource management. Fight for your life and try and get the highest time alive possible.*

W A S D  to move

Left click to shoot

Aim with your mouse

Escape for the pause menu

This game was a submission for the 7DRL Challenge 2023.

Please report any bugs or give any feedback, any feedback or criticism is welcome, Enjoy the game!

*Leaderboards have not been implemented yet
